GenesisPassport.AkiBit.card.2.content: Primary <weight900>Service Fee Payment Currency</weight900> for Discovering, Inscribing, Minting, and Launching BRC-20 Tokens and Beyond on Aki BIT & Bithub.
GenesisPassport.AkiBit.card.3.title: DISCOUNT
GenesisPassport.AkiBit.card.3.content: Holding $AKI to waive up to 100% <weight900>Aki BIT & Bithub</weight900> Fees. <weight900>Gas Fees Discounts</weight900>.
